backend/main.mo: Primary backend canister defining file, folder, mission, profile management, authorization mixins, and diagnostic endpoints with in‑memory maps and counters.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old persistent mission data structures into the new format by mapping missions and tasks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking mission-related frontend files to specific requirements and confidence assessments.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in UI, hooks, dialogs, and utilities.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation establishing a frozen baseline identical to Live v114, outlining validation steps and change‑control rules.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: Primary HTML entrypoint setting up PWA metadata, icons, and loading the React app.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change‑control notice declaring a post‑restore freeze and restrictions until explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, display mode, and startup configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, network-first fetch logic, and cache cleanup.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying frontend restoration to Live v114, covering authentication, UI components, styling, and utilities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper handling theme, providers, and conditional intro display based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing error states during actor initialization with retry, logout, and technical details.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG-based animated gallery icon with hover effects and layered visual elements.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty file placeholder for a connectivity status component.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed decorative bottom line for UI styling.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a file cannot be opened in a new tab, offering retry and download options.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Displays a dialog with file preview, metadata, and actions like open, download, move, and delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file and link uploads with progress tracking, validation, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders view, with optional overlay and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folders management dialog supporting create, rename, delete, and selection of folders.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen UI for listing, creating, renaming, deleting, and selecting folders.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full‑screen file viewer with swipe navigation, external open, download, delete, share, and folder actions.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays files in a gallery with touch gestures, selection mode, long‑press handling, and file opening logic including viewer, download, and link fallback dialogs.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with theme toggle, authentication menu, and a global progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a timed animated splash screen that fades out before calling a completion callback.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Provides a dialog for when external link opening fails, offering retry and copy‑link actions.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button that triggers Internet Identity login and shows a spinner while logging in.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission editor displaying mission data, tasks, autosave behavior, and attached file viewing with link fallback support.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title input, task list editing, and submit handling through backend APIs.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating action button that opens the missions section, with animated icon and disabled state handling.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen mission list UI supporting creation, selection, swipe actions, progress display, and mission deletion with animations.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Container component that restricts its children to a mobile-only layout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for selecting a mission and moving files into it, showing mission list and handling mutation state.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files to folders or back to the main collection, with mutation handling and folder list UI.
Reusable row component enabling swipe-to-reveal edit and delete actions with pointer gesture handling.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Global upload progress bar showing overall progress and item count when uploads are active.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen with branding graphics and a login button for first-time users.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Provides a context managing backend actor initialization with retries, admin-token setup, and error classification.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Tracks file and link upload batches, aggregates progress, and updates progress efficiently using animation-frame batching.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity using React Query, initializing access control when needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management using Dfinity’s AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer to distinguish touch from mouse input.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Autosaves mission title and tasks with debouncing, deep-change detection, and queued saves during in‑flight updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, and updating missions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: File is empty or missing content.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating files and folders via a backend actor with caching and concurrency controls.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes, plus global and mobile layout styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a helper function to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the main home page, handling authentication state, data fetching, smoke tests, and UI section toggling.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines standardized actor initialization error messages and helpers to classify backend actor errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides utilities for opening external URLs with popup‑block detection and downloading files via blobs.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open (viewer, office preview, or download) based on MIME type.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes files by MIME type and provides helpers for determining preview capability and readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Compares arrays of mission tasks safely with BigInt support to detect equality.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Provides optional performance timing utilities with start/end logging and an async wrapper, enabled via URL or localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Adds helpers to inspect React Query mission cache state and log delete mutation lifecycle details.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs a backend smoke test covering folder creation, mission creation, file upload, and list verification steps.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple promise-based concurrency limiter with a queue and max parallel execution setting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radius, animations, and enabling plugins and dark mode.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Lists all frontend files defining the v114 baseline for verification and drift detection.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing mission-related bugs, scope limits, existing requirements, and pending feature requests.
